reviewText: Great DVD. I very much enjoyed it. I felt bad for the persons who did not win the competitions. I adore Shahrukh and Kajol seems so down to earth and sweet.

This is a must-have for Shah Rukh Khan fans. The way he interacts in interviews is always nice to watch, with his usual wit, charm and intelligence and he is wonderful on here also! Kajol is refreshing with her candid comments, humor, and down-to-earth personality. A great dvd!

I laughed and cried and completely enjoyed the programs on this DVD. The first part is a show featuring Shah Rukh Khan. The second show features Kajol. This is well worth purchasing - hours of enjoyment!
